Text.Page:
Jelena needs me, but I can't abandon my men here. I want you to go help my comrade in the city.

I can't remember who's in charge of the advance scouts...

Oh! Right. Rendalf. You should talk to him first.

Are you my reinforcement? Sorry for the short notice, but these cultists are stronger than we thought. Only Elleon and Leander were able to advance any farther.

We stayed here to build the camp. I'm expecting worse to come.
